title: Introducing Else If Statements

challengeFiles.name: script

solutions.name: script

tests.text: You should have at least two else statements
You should have at least two if statements
You should have closing and opening curly braces for each if else code block.

description:
If you have multiple conditions that need to be addressed, you can chain if statements together with else if statements.

if (num > 15) {
  return "Bigger than 15";
} else if (num < 5) {
  return "Smaller than 5";
} else {
  return "Between 5 and 15";
}
instructions: Convert the logic to use else if statements.
